Package com.qulice.pmd.rules

Class UseStringIsEmptyRule

java.lang.Object
net.sourceforge.pmd.properties.AbstractPropertySource
net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.rule.AbstractRule
net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.java.rule.AbstractJavaRule
net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.java.rule.AbstractJavaRulechainRule
com.qulice.pmd.rules.UseStringIsEmptyRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.ast.AstVisitor, net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.java.ast.JavaVisitor, net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.rule.Rule, net.sourceforge.pmd.properties.PropertySource
public final class UseStringIsEmptyRule extends net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.java.rule.AbstractJavaRulechainRule
Rule to prohibit use of String.length() when checking for empty string. String.isEmpty() should be used instead.
Since:
0.18
